name: @evanhalley/fig
description: Command line utility that generates features images for blog posts

scripts.start: tsc --build && node dist/fig-cli.js --title Hello World --author Evan Halley --date 2021-03-20 --html-template /Users/evan/source/fig/template/template.html --author-image /Users/evan/source/fig/template/author.jpg --css /Users/evan/source/fig/template/style.css -o /Users/evan/Desktop/test.png -v

author: Evan Halley - (https://evanhalley.dev/me)
